summary: This bill, S.1324, proposes amendments to the Safe Drinking Water Act. It focuses on modifying the eligibility criteria for the State response to contaminants program. The modifications include technical fixes to existing language, changes to how communities qualify for assistance, and clarifies eligibility for grants to states on behalf of disadvantaged communities or those with limited debt capacity. It also expands eligibility to owners of drinking water wells not connected to public water systems.
